commit ca3862cd2a8086fff712efe79e0bf013eda33505
Author: Alexey I. Froloff <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Feb 17 16:16:42 2015 +0300

    Wrap IPv6 address in square brackets for scp/rsync
    
    Address, contained in nova.netconf.my_ip config option, is passed to
    scp/rsync when copying image during migration.  If this option contains
    IPv6 address, scp/rsync fails.
    
    Wrapping IPv6 address in square brackets solves this problem.  Code was
    adopted from swift project.
    
    Change-Id: Ia5f28673e79158d948980f2b3ce496c6a56882af
    Closes-Bug: #1422691
